gameFlavour: In a world where warriors prove themselves in an endless shifting labyrinth, your journey starts at rock bottom. Climb the ranks, earn your place among legends, and uncover the secret of the maze â€” a truth that might change everything.

exploreMazeRooms.title: Explore Maze Rooms
details: Each maze run is procedurally generated (different layouts each time).
Rooms contain enemies, puzzles, traps, or treasure.

fightEnemies.title: Fight Enemies
details: Defeat enemies to gain EXP and Rank Points.

levelAndRankUp.title: Level Up & Rank Up
details: EXP increases your Level (boosts stats like health, speed, attack).
Rank Points increase your Rank Tier (unlocks new abilities).

progressiveDifficulty.title: Progressive Difficulty
details: Higher ranks unlock deeper maze layers with harder enemies and better rewards.

deathAndRespawn.title: Death & Respawn
details: If you die, you respawn at your base camp with your rank intact but lose temporary loot.
